radiographic_examinations.findings: Widening of intercellular spaces in the epidermis and a reduced number of small, poorly-formed desmosomes.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Pathologic examination of a fresh peeling skin lesion
radiographic_examinations.findings: Compact orthokeratosis with hypergranulosis, focal areas of parakeratosis, acantholysis in the granular layer with detached individual keratinocytes and dyskeratotic cells, and a superficial perivascular mixed infiltrate of polymorphonuclear leukocytes and eosinophils.
Enlarged intercellular spaces between keratinocytes and reductions in both desmosome size and number.
